name: knight hurdle Dawn V- 1.0
description:
knight hurdle Dawn is an 2 D  Adventure game developed by Tanishk Vashisth  who is an indie game developer and 15 years old ..

 This game fascinates to  the adventure and also the level of the beauty by reaching to the end overcoming different types of obstacles.

 It is  a beginning of my gaming projects .It is my first ever released game and if you liked please don't forget to leave a comment  that what you liked and don't liked in this game. your honest feedback will motivate me a a lot .

.Regards   TanishkVashisth (INDIA) ...

..can you  pass the Levels any Reach to the End??! then GOOD LUCK! _thank you for viewing my game ...(INDIA).

it is for Free for PC MAC LINUX STANDALONE ....

DISK SPACE - 66 mb

Android version will be released soon .!

THANK YOU !..
